key_findings.finding: Strong positive correlation (0.75) between x and y. As x increases, y tends to increase.
Strong positive correlation (0.75) between y and x. As x increases, y tends to increase.
x has a strong impact on y (R² = 0.56). When x increases, y typically increases.
category segment 'C' has 38.1% higher x than segment 'A'
